Address.value: 1150 NORTH ALMA SCHOOL ROAD, MESA, Arizona, 85201, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Verra Mobility Corp provides smart transportation solutions. The company develops and uses technology and data intelligence to help make transportation safer and easier. It operates in three segments namely Commercial Services, Government Solutions and Parking Solutions. It generates maximum revenue from the Commercial Services segment. Commercial Services segment delivers tolling and violation management services to rental car companies, commercial fleet vehicle owners and violation issuing authorities.
